version_description: fixed a bug that caused the app to crash on iOS 5

With this update we have added many many cards! They're split up into decks of cards which you can select before starting the game.
This way you can set the tone of your game and have the best experience!
If you previously had the app before the update, there's a bonus for ya! We're giving away 2 decks for all of you.
Many bugs have been fixed and we improved the usability as well!
We added a "The best of #iPuke" button on the home screen, which takes you straight to our Instagram page where you'll see loads of funny stuff and a bunch of people performing our dares all around the globe!
Enjoy!

- fixed a bug that caused the game to nuts when you tried to swipe the on/off switch for drinks and dares
- other small bugs and improvements

- fixed crash when loading the deck selection screen
- fixed random crashes during the game
Fixed black screen bug on iOS 11

- layout improvements for iPhone X an Xs
- fixed some bugs here and there
